para_P.title: Is it possible that by January 1, 2028, both of the following will take place: (a) The worldwide market for chemical goods expands by a minimum of 15% each year for three successive years, and (b) No new major pharmaceutical product achieves over $10 billion in sales?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered 'Yes' if both of the following criteria are satisfied: (a) The worldwide market for chemical goods increases by at least 15% annually for three consecutive years during any timeframe from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028, as verified by information from a credible market research organization or industry body; and (b) No new pharmaceutical product generates more than $10 billion in global sales, as reported by a reliable source like EvaluatePharma or a leading pharmaceutical firm, at any time between October 1, 2024 and January 1, 2028, with the product being newly launched after the date this question was formulated.

question.title: Will either of the following occur by January 1, 2028: (a) A new blockbuster drug from pharmacology generates over $10 billion in revenue, or (b) The global market for chemical products grows by at least 15% annually for three consecutive years?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if either of the following conditions is met: (a) A new drug developed in the field of pharmacology generates over $10 billion in global revenue, as reported by a reputable source such as EvaluatePharma or a major pharmaceutical company, at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The drug must be newly introduced to the market after the creation date of this question. (b) The global market for chemical products grows by at least 15% year-over-year for three consecutive years in any period between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The growth rate must be confirmed by data from a reputable market research firm or industry association.

para_P.title: Is it possible that by January 1, 2028, either (a) a new blockbuster drug in pharmacology achieves over $10 billion in sales, or (b) the worldwide market for chemical products expands by a minimum of 15% each year for three straight years?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if one of the following scenarios occurs: (a) A newly developed drug in pharmacology generates more than $10 billion in global sales, as verified by a credible source like EvaluatePharma or a prominent pharmaceutical firm, at any time from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028. The drug must be launched after the date this question was formulated. (b) The global chemical products market experiences a growth rate of at least 15% annually for three consecutive years during any timeframe from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028. This growth must be substantiated by data from a reliable market research organization or industry association.

question.title: Will the European Union expand its membership to include at least one new country before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, the European Union officially expands its membership to include at least one new country. The new membership must be confirmed by the European Council and published in the Official Journal of the European Union.

para_P.title: Is it possible for the European Union to add at least one new member state before January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if the European Union officially admits at least one new country into its membership between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The addition of the new member must be ratified by the European Council and announced in the Official Journal of the European Union.

question.title: Will both of the following occur by January 1, 2028: (a) Ukraine's GDP grows by at least 20% from its 2023 level, and (b) the European Union does not expand its membership to include any new countries?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if both of the following conditions are met between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028: (a) Ukraine's Gross Domestic Product (GDP) grows by at least 20% from its 2023 level, with GDP data sourced from the World Bank or International Monetary Fund (IMF), and (b) the European Union does not officially expand its membership to include any new countries, confirmed by the absence of new membership confirmations by the European Council and publications in the Official Journal of the European Union.

para_P.title: By January 1, 2028, will the following two events take place: (a) an increase of at least 20% in Ukraine's GDP from its level in 2023, and (b) no new countries will have joined the European Union?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if both of the subsequent criteria are satisfied between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028: (a) Ukraine's Gross Domestic Product (GDP) rises by no less than 20% compared to its 2023 figure, with GDP statistics obtained from the World Bank or International Monetary Fund (IMF), and (b) the European Union does not officially welcome any new member states, which will be confirmed by the lack of new membership announcements from the European Council and the absence of such listings in the Official Journal of the European Union.

question.title: Will either of the following occur by January 1, 2028: (a) The European Union expands its membership to include at least one new country, or (b) Ukraine's GDP grows by at least 20% from its 2023 level?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if either of the following occurs between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028: (a) The European Union officially expands its membership to include at least one new country, confirmed by the European Council and published in the Official Journal of the European Union, or (b) Ukraine's Gross Domestic Product (GDP) grows by at least 20% from its 2023 level, with GDP data sourced from the World Bank or International Monetary Fund (IMF).

para_P.title: Is it possible that by January 1, 2028, either (a) the European Union will add at least one new member state, or (b) Ukraine's GDP will increase by no less than 20% compared to its level in 2023?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if, during the period from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028, either (a) the European Union formally incorporates at least one new country into its membership, as confirmed by the European Council and recorded in the Official Journal of the European Union, or (b) Ukraine's Gross Domestic Product (GDP) rises by a minimum of 20% from its 2023 figure, with GDP statistics obtained from the World Bank or International Monetary Fund (IMF).

question.title: Will the US Senate have at least 55 Democratic members after the 2026 midterm elections?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if, following the 2026 midterm elections and before 2028-01-01, the US Senate has at least 55 members who are officially affiliated with the Democratic Party. The composition must be verified by official Senate records.

para_P.title: Will there be a minimum of 55 Democratic senators in the US Senate post the 2026 midterm elections?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if, after the 2026 midterm elections and before January 1, 2028, the US Senate includes no fewer than 55 members who are formally associated with the Democratic Party. This must be confirmed through official Senate documentation.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) a new chemical process for large-scale carbon capture be successfully developed and commercially implemented before January 1, 2028, and (b) the US Senate have fewer than 55 Democratic members after the 2026 midterm elections?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if both of the following conditions are met: (a) Between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, a new chemical process for large-scale carbon capture is successfully developed and commercially implemented. The process must be verified by independent experts and reported in reputable scientific journals. Commercial implementation means that the process is being used in at least one large-scale industrial application. (b) Following the 2026 midterm elections and before 2028-01-01, the US Senate has fewer than 55 members who are officially affiliated with the Democratic Party. The composition must be verified by official Senate records.

para_P.title: Is it possible that either of the following happens: (a) the US Senate will consist of a minimum of 55 Democratic members after the midterm elections in 2026, or (b) a novel chemical method for large-scale carbon capture will be effectively created and put into commercial use prior to January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if at least one of the following conditions is met: (a) After the midterm elections of 2026 and before January 1, 2028, the US Senate contains no fewer than 55 members officially linked to the Democratic Party, as confirmed by official Senate documentation. (b) Between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, a new chemical technique for large-scale carbon capture is successfully developed and put into commercial operation, validated by independent authorities and published in credible scientific journals, where commercial operation indicates that the method is being utilized in at least one significant industrial application.

question.title: Will the United States Congress pass a bill related to space exploration or astronomy before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if the United States Congress passes a bill specifically related to space exploration or astronomy between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The bill must be signed into law by the President and documented in the Congressional records.

para_P.title: Is it possible for the United States Congress to enact legislation concerning space exploration or astronomy prior to January 1, 2028?

question.title: Will both of the following occur before January 1, 2028: (a) Japan successfully lands a spacecraft on the Moon, and (b) the United States Congress does not pass any bill related to space exploration or astronomy?

(b) The United States Congress does not pass any bill specifically related to space exploration and does not pass any bill related to astronomy. No such bill must be signed into law by the President and documented in the Congressional records.

question.title: Will the Bureau of Labor Statistics report an annual inflation rate in the United States exceeding 10% for any year between 2024 and 2027?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if the Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) reports an annual inflation rate in the United States exceeding 10% for any calendar year between 2024 and 2027. The inflation rate must be based on official BLS data releases.

para_P.title: Is it possible for Taiwan's semiconductor sector to have exports greater than $150 billion in any year prior to January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if the value of Taiwan's semiconductor sector exports surpasses $150 billion in any calendar year from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028. The export figures must be obtained from Taiwan's Ministry of Economic Affairs or a credible alternative.

question.title: Will both of the following occur before January 1, 2028: (a) Ukraine establishes a functional space agency, and (b) Taiwan's semiconductor industry exports never exceed $150 billion in any calendar year?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if both of the following conditions are met before January 1, 2028: (a) Ukraine establishes a functional space agency, with the establishment officially confirmed by the Ukrainian government and reported by reputable news sources, and (b) Taiwan's semiconductor industry exports never exceed $150 billion in value in any calendar year between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, with export data sourced from Taiwan's Ministry of Economic Affairs or another reputable source.

para_P.title: Is it possible that by January 1, 2028, both of the following will take place: (a) Ukraine successfully sets up a working space agency, and (b) Taiwan's semiconductor sector will not have exports surpassing $150 billion in any given year?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if the following two criteria are fulfilled prior to January 1, 2028: (a) Ukraine successfully establishes a working space agency, with this establishment officially recognized by the Ukrainian authorities and reported by credible news outlets, and (b) Taiwan's semiconductor sector does not have exports exceeding $150 billion in total value in any calendar year from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028, with export figures obtained from Taiwan's Ministry of Economic Affairs or another trustworthy source.

question.title: Will either of the following occur before January 1, 2028: (a) Taiwan's semiconductor industry exports exceed $150 billion in any calendar year, or (b) Ukraine establishes a functional space agency?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if either of the following occurs: (a) Taiwan's semiconductor industry exports exceed $150 billion in value in any calendar year between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, with export data sourced from Taiwan's Ministry of Economic Affairs or another reputable source; or (b) Ukraine establishes a functional space agency between the creation date of this question and January 1, 2028, with establishment officially confirmed by the Ukrainian government and reported by reputable news sources.

para_P.title: Is it possible that before January 1, 2028, either of the following happens: (a) Taiwan's semiconductor sector's exports surpass $150 billion in any given year, or (b) Ukraine sets up a viable space agency?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed 'Yes' if either of the subsequent events takes place: (a) Taiwan's semiconductor sector achieves exports exceeding $150 billion in value in any calendar year from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028, with export figures obtained from Taiwan's Ministry of Economic Affairs or another credible source; or (b) Ukraine successfully establishes a viable space agency between the date of this question's creation and January 1, 2028, with the establishment officially recognized by the Ukrainian government and reported by trustworthy news outlets.

question.title: Will Australia or Norway hold a referendum on any national issue before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if either Australia or Norway holds a referendum on any national issue between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The referendum must be officially recognized and its results recorded by the respective country's official electoral body.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Australia or Norway will conduct a referendum regarding a national matter prior to January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if either Australia or Norway carries out a referendum on any national matter from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028. The referendum must receive official acknowledgment and its outcomes documented by the official electoral authority of the respective nation.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Russia officially withdraws from the Paris Agreement before January 1, 2028, and (b) neither Australia nor Norway holds a referendum on any national issue before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if both of the following conditions are met: (a) Russia officially notifies the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) of its withdrawal from the Paris Agreement and completes the withdrawal process before January 1, 2028, with the withdrawal confirmed by official UNFCCC documentation; and (b) neither Australia nor Norway holds a referendum on any national issue between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, with the referendum officially recognized and its results recorded by the respective country's official electoral body.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will take place: (a) Russia will formally exit the Paris Agreement prior to January 1, 2028, and (b) neither Australia nor Norway will conduct a referendum on any national matter before January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed 'Yes' if both of the subsequent criteria are satisfied: (a) Russia officially informs the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) of its departure from the Paris Agreement and completes the withdrawal procedure before January 1, 2028, with the withdrawal validated by official UNFCCC documentation; and (b) neither Australia nor Norway organizes a referendum on any national matter from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028, with the referendum officially acknowledged and its outcomes recorded by the appropriate electoral authority of each country.

question.title: Will either of the following occur before January 1, 2028: (a) Australia or Norway hold a referendum on any national issue, (b) Russia officially withdraw from the Paris Agreement?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if either of the following occurs: (a) Australia or Norway holds a referendum on any national issue between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The referendum must be officially recognized and its results recorded by the respective country's official electoral body. (b) Russia officially notifies the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) of its withdrawal from the Paris Agreement and completes the withdrawal process before January 1, 2028. The withdrawal must be confirmed by official UNFCCC documentation.

para_P.title: Is it possible that either of the following will take place prior to January 1, 2028: (a) a national referendum is conducted by Australia or Norway on any issue, (b) Russia formally exits the Paris Agreement?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed 'Yes' if at least one of the following happens: (a) a national referendum is held by Australia or Norway on any issue from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028. The referendum must be officially sanctioned and its outcomes documented by the relevant electoral authority of the country. (b) Russia officially informs the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) of its decision to withdraw from the Paris Agreement and finalizes the withdrawal process before January 1, 2028. The withdrawal must be validated by official documentation from the UNFCCC.
